text: Any one familiar with HubSpot's site search functionality / blog search functionality? How robust is it – do you find it accurate, etc?

hi guys, im looking to implement sticky elements on a site using classes but am running into some trouble that i suspect might have something to do with the divs HubSpot injects between parent and child here. any ideas?
yea need to go a little mental with direct decendants selectors in css and height 100%
<#C9LPMCT35|site-search-feedback> may have some answers for you
Did the new design manager automatically start unrolling to all of the portals? We had a client report it was upgraded “automagically” for them this morning.
I don’t think so - I still have access to an account that isn’t upgraded.
haha sorry I wasn't more specific, bit painful :slightly_smiling_face:
